questions.text: Which actor portrayed the security guard at Wally World?
Eugene Levy plays the clerk at the hotel in the Grand Canyon scene.
questions.explanation:
False.

	He plays the car salesman at the beginning of the film.

questions.text: Which state did Ellen lose her vanity case in?
questions.explanation:
Colorado.

	Remember they ran over the railroad tracks and 2 cases from the roof fell off while they were in Colorado.

questions.correct: Anthony Michael Hall and Dana Barron
options: Anthony Michael Hall and Juliette Lewis
questions.explanation: Anthony Michael Hall and Dana Barron.

questions.text: What did Aunt Edna say to Eddie when she left with the Griswolds?
questions.correct: Not to worry, she made arrangements for the checks to be sent
options: She punched him in the stomach and told him he was stupid
Not to worry, she would make sure that they were not sent a dime
questions.explanation: Not to worry, she made arrangements for the checks to be sent.

questions.text: This was the first movie that Anthony Michael Hall was in that had any association with John Hughes.
questions.explanation:
True.

	He was later in "Weird Science" and "The Breakfast Club" which were also written and/or directed by John Hughes.

questions.text: At the end of the movie the Griswolds fly home.
questions.explanation:
True.

	We don't actually see them reach home but Ellen tells Clark that she got her parents to give them some money so that they can fly home.

questions.text: How much did it cost for the vibrating bed in the hotel room?
What did Christie Brinkley's license plate say?
questions.explanation:
Luv Me.

	The car was a red Ferrari.

False.

	It was directed by Harold Ramis.
